name: Through Uncharted Seas
description:
Through Uncharted Seas is a game developed during the 2022 Game Jam Plus.

Its concept and story is heavily based on the Portuguese writer Luis de Camoes' book "Os Lusiadas". However, this prototype only contains Adamastor's boss fight.

Will you, as Vasco da Gama, be able to persist through the difficulties that the god Baco sends in your way and get to India by traveling such troubled seas?
